Description:
Key Responsibilities:Achieve the sales targets for the year.
Be the One Schneider Organization representing all BU’s  
Promote all Products of SE esp. Switchgear, Controlgear, MV, BBT, VSDs etc. to  Panel Builders, Building Segement
Manage and Support all channels of SE in the given territory
Engage and Co ordinate with all BU’s to support the local actions 
Prescription, Service support, Promotions etc ……   
Increase the SE Market share
One SE Brand  Ambassador  
Prescription and Business Development in Building segement, Panel Builders, Contractors 
Sales Management
Channel as GTM strategy Desired Candidate Profile:Graduate in Engineering (BE/B.Tech) - EEE/ECE/CSE
Experience -  8-12 years Switchgear and Automation ( More on Switchgear)Job Details
